attributes.action: More street cameras, lights in alleyways and have more police on patrol at night
attributes.additional_details: To decrease the amount of people that get raped to a minimum because it’s a massive issue that doesn’t seem to be taken seriously.
attributes.background: Implementing street cameras would mean that if there was a rape case there would be evidence against the rapist. Increasing the amount of police at night would mean that people would be able to feel more safe when commuting home late, lights would make it harder for rapist making it safer

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This is a matter for local councils and the police.

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to make funding available for local authorities and police forces in order to improve public safety.
